data.message: you should do a collabo with insane clown posse or twiztid even... that would be the fucking shit duder!!! or even madchild.. or better yet corey mutherfucking taylor!! cmon nuff of that skylar grey pink rhianna shit dude.. my fave albums of yours is from early 90s to the eminem show... 25 to life was a really good song though on the recovery album ill admit.. XD much love from kamloops, BC dude!!
